Package org.bladerunnerjs.plugin

Contains all plug-in interfaces and core plug-in classes, and sub-packages containing each of the standard BRJS plug-ins.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AssetLocationPlugin
    Asset location plug-ins allow new asset directory structures to be supported within the model.
    AssetPlugin
    Asset plug-ins allow new implementations of SourceModule, LinkedAsset & Asset to be supported within the model.
    CommandPlugin
    Command plug-ins allow new commands to be made available to users of BladeRunnerJS.
    ContentPlugin
    Content plug-ins allow generated content to be returned by the application server in response to requests from the web browser.
    Event  
    EventObserver  
    MinifierPlugin
    Minifier plug-ins allow alternate minifier implementations to be made available for JavaScript & CSS minification.
    ModelObserverPlugin
    Model observer plug-ins observe events within the model using the AbstractNode.addObserver(org.bladerunnerjs.plugin.EventObserver) method, and act appropriately to the events received.
    OrderedPlugin  
    Plugin
    Plugin is the base interface for all plug-ins within BladeRunnerJS.
    PluginLocator  
    RequirePlugin  
    ResponseContent  
    TagHandlerPlugin
    Tag handler plug-ins allow BladeRunnerJS tags within index pages (e.g.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinaryResponseContent  
    CharResponseContent  
    InputSource  
    Locale  

Package org.bladerunnerjs.plugin Description

Contains all plug-in interfaces and core plug-in classes, and sub-packages containing each of the standard BRJS plug-ins.
